Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

Just a quick question : is there a built-in function used to get the system time of the player, or does it require to use a Javascript ?
I'd like to test a real time mini-game, and be able to interact with all Quest elements depending on the time.

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

Posts.EditableText: no, there is no build in time function
Posts.HTML: no, there is no build in time function

Posts.EditableText: Should be possible using JavaScript though.
Posts.HTML: Should be possible using JavaScript though.
